Articles.Content:
LISTEN UP MAGGOTS!

The Kerbal Government Secret Service (also known as the KGSS) Wants you to Design, construct and launch a High altitude Supersonic Jet To Circumnavigate The earth In less then 1 hour. You are Not to leave the atmosphere and the crew must Survive

medals will be awarded For the Following Achievements

Not Going Any Higher then 30,000 Meters

Landing Safely Back down at the KSC

Using Only the C7 pack & Vanilla

Arriving under 30 minutes.

Using only One Stage (except for the jettisoning of the crew)

Photos will be necessary

For

Launch

1 quarter

Half way

3quarter

Landing

CAN YOU DO IT?
Sounds like a [glow=magenta,7,300]JUICED[/glow] version of Sordid\'s challenge.

very Much So

its something that Jeb Would Love

This plane might do it... my computer won\'t let me fly it since the instruments wig out on the pad and the framerate sucks.

Someone else can try it out;

Just climb to 25k and level out - you\'ll supercruise at 1200-1500m/s easy with not much throttle, just keep adjusting it to keep it between 25 and 30k.
Edit: made the Challenge more challengy. Reduced the time
I do assume that vanilla parts are of course allowed

To do it in 30 minutes you have to average roughly 2100m/s

Below 30k? Have fun!
